title: Simplify Client-Side Script Management for your Next Web Project
author: Uday Verma
description: We often code a lot of quick prototypes at Mazira.  Every time I start coding a new front-end I despise the process where I have to go out on the Internet and figure out CDNs or download locations for all the scripts I may need.  I also prefer to keep my scripts local to avoid surprises when things change and to be able to work when I am at places where my Internet connectivity is not as great (coding outside during the summer is awesome at Mazira's main office in Iowa City).
